column5: Now that the ice is gone, can anyone provide a reading on the water levels in the Perrault Falls area? I'm particularly interested in Pickerel Creek upstream from Jackfish Lake to Pickerel, and the creek between Fleet Lake and Schultz Lake.
Sounds like you fish in the same as we do. We stay at the Gold Arrow resort. Are you in that same area also? I would like to hear how the water levels are also.
Yup, we've been listening to Don's stories for 31 years now! Every year and always the 1st or 2nd week of the season.
The Eagle Lake water levels are high. I would expect they are similar in the Perrault Falls area as well.
